scenes.name: Scheduled
scenes.notification: Scheduled cleaning task is ready! Tap to view and free up space, enhancing performance.

scenes.name: Unlock
scenes.notification: Welcome back! New files need attention. Tap to clean now and ensure optimal phone performance.

scenes.name: Charge
scenes.notification: Phone is charging. To boost charging efficiency, consider cleaning unnecessary files. Tap to check options.

scenes.name: Uninstall
scenes.notification: You've just uninstalled an app. Want to clean related residual files? Tap to clean and keep your system tidy.
